title: Fanged Love
description: This short story, which inspired Ally Thomas' Vampire from Hell series, begins the tale about Grace, a naive human led astray by her sinister boyfriend, Nathan into a world of bloodletting and casual sex. In one night she realizes her lover is destined to ultimately be her greatest enemy. (4,205 words)Grace's story continues in Fanged Destiny (Fanged Love #2).
author: Ally Thomas
